title: Attempting to reconnect and FPS drops
body:
Since this last patch League has  been really buggy for me. Whenever I try to start LoL and try to log in I always get the "Attempting to reconnect'' error message. I found out that reinstalling the game fixes this, but I'm only able to play one match, after that the error cycle continues.

I also used to have an solid 100 FPS, but nowadays I usually get very low FPS when I'm like 10+/- minutes in game.

Does anyone encounters the same problem as me? Or maybe knows how to fix this?

replies.body: I think reinstalling fixing might just be a coincidence, and the actual culprit here may be an unstable connection.  These issues that you're experiencing are leading up to a complete disconnect from the game server, so it's super important to resolve that first.  It's very likely this will tide over to fix everything else.  :D  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix that up, just be sure to do it in a custom game!
